title: S13 Ep93: Tombstone Expanded Edition: The Quick & The Dead
itunes:title: Tombstone Expanded Edition: The Quick & The Dead
description:
Today on BEYOND the DARKNESS Tombstone Expanded Edition: The Quick & The Dead!

It's a powerpacked episode with special celebrities from the 25th Anniversary of Tombstone the Movie sharing stories, history and fun.
Then later in the program we sit down with the owners of The Buford House, local paranormal investigators and historians to talk ghostly encounters.
